name: Solomon Internet Funding
overview:
Solomon Internet Funding is backed by a successful Japanese Corporation, Naito Corporation. With over 30 years of experience in short term lending in Japan, this company has now opened physical locations in Los Angeles area and also lending online.

In compare to the other lenders, Solomon Internet Funding is a direct lender, that lends out to its customers directly without any broker or middle man involved. “Circle of Trust” is slogan of the company, which according to Japanese traditions, they will focus care more about building relationship and trust with their customers first.

It is one of the fastest growing short term lenders in US, currently offering only payday loans, but soon will be offering other type of short term loans including installment loans, title loans, and small business loans.
